title: 91/362/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 June 1991 amending the Annex to Commission Decision 90/411/EEC concerning the areas referred to in Article 3 (2) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 328/88 instituting a Community programme to assist the conversion of steel areas (Resider programme) (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 20 June 1991  amending the Annex to Commission Decision 90/411/EEC concerning the areas referred to in Article 3 (2) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 328/88 instituting a Community programme to assist the conversion of steel  areas (Resider programme)  (Only the Spanish text is authentic)  (91/362/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 June 1991. For the Commission
Bruce MILLAN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 33, 5. 2. 1988, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 209, 8. 8. 1990, p. 23.
